description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Exeter, United Kingdom. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Exeter Heritage Escape with Cathedral Views & Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: A grand millinery store in the late 1700s, Hotel Indigo Exeter, an IHG Hotel has been lovingly restored to a treasure trove of heritage intrigue and modern-day luxury. Curated spaces are designed to spark imagination: the ocean-toned Retreat Spa transports its visitors to bliss, while Beckett's Rooftop Cocktail Bar is perfect for a breath of fresh air and a cocktail. Lovers of seafood can make a beeline for Colson's Restaurant for exquisite dishes including lobster risotto and Dorset crab tagliatelle.

seo.title: Hotel a Exeter - United Kingdom Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Exeter, United Kingdom con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
